welcome_message_body: Welcome to Daule, Ecuador! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Daule has to offer.

restaurants.name: El Artesano
restaurants.description: El Artesano is a argentinian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Carls Jr Daule
restaurants.description: Carls Jr Daule is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Mi Comida
restaurants.description: Mi Comida is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Paradero Manabita
restaurants.description: Paradero Manabita is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Paradero Chiveria
restaurants.description: Paradero Chiveria is a breakfast spot located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
